mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE VALUES (SEQ_EMP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{posNo}, #{deptNo}, #{empName}, #{empGender}, #{empPhone}, #{empSal}, #{empEmail}, TO_DATE(#{empHiredate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), null, #{empSsc}, #{empDegree}, #{empCareer}, #{empPwd}, #{empRePhoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empPhoto, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empMil})
mapper.select: select e.emp_re_photo, e.emp_photo, e.emp_no, e.emp_name, e.emp_gender, e.emp_ssc, e.emp_sal, e.emp_phone, e.emp_email, to_char(emp_hiredate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as emp_hiredate, to_char(emp_retdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as emp_retdate, d.dept_name, p.pos_name, e.emp_degree, e.emp_career, e.emp_mil from employee e, department d, position p where e.dept_no = d.dept_no and e.pos_no = p.pos_no and e.emp_no=#{empNo}
select d.dept_no, d.dept_name, d.dept_head, d.dept_date, d.dept_modify, e.emp_name from department d, employee e where d.dept_head = e.emp_no order by d.dept_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into department values (seq_dept_no.nextval, #{deptName}, sysdate, null, #{empNo})
